titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I revised & partly rewrote a sermon for next Sunday evening: and then wrote letters. The heavy rain prevent my walking out, so I made shift for exercise in the Great Library. Then I read & noted Master Whitgift for an hour. Compston arrived a few minutes before midnight.
